HOME.WATER_TEKST: Przeprowadzono test na wodzie oraz wykonano optymalizację doboru mocy silników(300 KM lub 2 silniki po 150KM). Łódz podlega nadzorowi PRS.
HOME.BUILDING_TEKST: Building of boat we were started in 2016 year. Building expected from us many work and involved. Project concept were still changing desigin. In 2017 year we finished working on boat form and we started work on first corpus and polishing result.
HOME.JOZEF_DESCRIPTION: Co-founder of company and production manager

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Our company is involved in production yachts. We adjusting our products to clients requirenments. Our yachts have luxury eqipement and modern looks.
